(I lean forward, a touch of sincerity in my voice) I’ve read a lot of Hemingway – I find his writing style incredibly powerful. And I’ve always been drawn to the poetry of Robert Frost. But I don’t pretend to understand all the nuances and symbolism.

(I lean forward, a touch of earnestness in my voice) I’m more of a “feel-good” kind of person when it comes to art and literature. I like stories that make me laugh, that make me cry, that make me think. I’m not interested in intellectual debates or complex theories.

(I look at you earnestly) I’m happy to talk about what I enjoy, and I’m always open to recommendations. But… I don’t consider myself an expert. I’m just… a guy who likes to appreciate beauty and find solace in stories. What about you? Are you sophisticated in art, music, or literature?
